scripts.build: ng build --configuration=production,de --base-href=/de/de/ --outputPath=dist/de/de && ng build --configuration=production,en --base-href=/de/en/ --outputPath=dist/de/en/ && ng build --configuration=production,it --base-href=/de/it/ --outputPath=dist/de/it && ng build --configuration=production,en --base-href=/my/en/ --outputPath=dist/my/en
scripts.build-testproduction: ng build --configuration=testproduction,de --base-href=/de/de/ --outputPath=dist/de/de && ng build --configuration=testproduction,en --base-href=/de/en/ --outputPath=dist/de/en && ng build --configuration=testproduction,it --base-href=/de/it/ --outputPath=dist/de/it && ng build --configuration=testproduction,en --base-href=/my/en/ --outputPath=dist/my/en
scripts.extract-i18n: ng xi18n pirat --format xlf --output-path src/i18n && ng run pirat:xliffmerge
